note.item: Fixed: Error when saving articles - metadata field handling corrected to support both JSON string and Registry object formats
Added: Support for article deletion notifications
Added: Robots noindex detection to skip indexing articles marked with noindex
Improved: Security enhancements for key file creation
Added: IndexNow API integration for automatic article indexing
Added: Support for multiple search engines (IndexNow, Bing, Yahoo, Yandex)
